name: Doomsday Arrival: Evolution into the Crimson King
author: 萌月文化
content: As the apocalyptic red fog engulfs the city, Yan Hao witnesses the tragic deaths of his loved ones and the disappearance of his sister. Driven by revenge and a search for his family, he joins humanity’s last line of defense, yet harbors a most dangerous secret: a power surging within him, shared with the power of otherworldly beasts!
